trans-unit.target: Max number of stored access policies per container, file share, table, or queue

trans-unit.target: Total Request Rate (assuming 1KB object size) per storage account

trans-unit.source: Up to 20,000 IOPS, entities per second, or messages per second
trans-unit.target: Up to 20,000 IOPS, entities per second, or messages per second

trans-unit.target: Target throughput for single blob

trans-unit.target: Target throughput for single queue (1 KB messages)

trans-unit.target: Up to 2000 messages per second

trans-unit.target: Target throughput for single table partition (1 KB entities)

trans-unit.source: Up to 2000 entities per second
trans-unit.target: Up to 2000 entities per second

trans-unit.source: Target throughput for single file share
trans-unit.target: Target throughput for single file share

trans-unit.source: Up to 60 MB per second
trans-unit.target: Up to 60 MB per second

trans-unit.source: Max ingress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (US Regions)
trans-unit.target: Max ingress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (US Regions)

trans-unit.source: 10 Gbps if GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 20 Gbps for LRS
trans-unit.target: 10 Gbps if GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 20 Gbps for LRS

trans-unit.source: Max egress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (US Regions)
trans-unit.target: Max egress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (US Regions)

trans-unit.source: 20 Gbps if RA-GRS/GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 30 Gbps for LRS
trans-unit.target: 20 Gbps if RA-GRS/GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 30 Gbps for LRS

trans-unit.source: Max ingress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (European and Asian Regions)
trans-unit.target: Max ingress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (European and Asian Regions)

trans-unit.source: 5 Gbps if GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 10 Gbps for LRS
trans-unit.target: 5 Gbps if GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 10 Gbps for LRS

trans-unit.source: Max egress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (European and Asian Regions)
trans-unit.target: Max egress<sup>2</sup> per storage account (European and Asian Regions)

trans-unit.source: 10 Gbps if RA-GRS/GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 15 Gbps for LRS
trans-unit.target: 10 Gbps if RA-GRS/GRS/ZRS<sup>3</sup> enabled, 15 Gbps for LRS

trans-unit.source: <sup>1</sup>If you require more than 100 storage accounts, make a request through [Azure Support](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/faq/).
trans-unit.target: <sup>1</sup>If you require more than 100 storage accounts, make a request through [Azure Support](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/faq/).

trans-unit.source: The Azure Storage team will review your business case.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Storage team will review your business case.

trans-unit.source: If they approve, they will allow you to have up to 250 storage accounts.
trans-unit.target: If they approve, they will allow you to have up to 250 storage accounts.

trans-unit.source: <sup>2</sup>*Ingress* refers to all data (requests) being sent to a storage account.
trans-unit.target: <sup>2</sup>*Ingress* refers to all data (requests) being sent to a storage account.

trans-unit.source: *Egress* refers to all data (responses) being received from a storage account.
trans-unit.target: *Egress* refers to all data (responses) being received from a storage account.

trans-unit.source: <sup>3</sup>Azure Storage replication options include:
trans-unit.target: <sup>3</sup>Azure Storage replication options include:

trans-unit.source: **RA-GRS**: Read-access geo-redundant storage.
trans-unit.target: **RA-GRS**: Read-access geo-redundant storage.

trans-unit.source: If RA-GRS is enabled, egress targets for the secondary location are identical to those for the primary location.
trans-unit.target: If RA-GRS is enabled, egress targets for the secondary location are identical to those for the primary location.

trans-unit.source: **GRS**: Geo-redundant storage.
trans-unit.target: **GRS**: Geo-redundant storage.

trans-unit.source: **ZRS**: Zone-redundant storage.
trans-unit.target: **ZRS**: Zone-redundant storage.

trans-unit.source: Available only for block blobs.
trans-unit.target: Available only for block blobs.

trans-unit.source: **LRS**: Locally redundant storage.
trans-unit.target: **LRS**: Locally redundant storage.
